name: @tilestion/package-validation
description: Toollib for signing and validating tilestion packages
author: Eliseo Cailloux

scripts.build:node: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node --format esm && bun build src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --target node --format esm --banner "#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.build:bun: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target bun --format esm && bun build src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --target bun --format esm --banner "#!/usr/bin/env bun"
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:node && bun run build:types
